short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export business leads from YellowPages search result page to a CSV file with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly export Yellow Pages business leads!

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open an Yellow Pages search result page.
2️⃣ Click open our extension, then click the Export button.
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Run in the background without waiting for finish.
2️⃣ Export on multiple search result pages simultaneous.
3️⃣ Export business leads for current search result to a csv file, data include: Business Name, Categories, Ratings, Rating Count, Website, Years In Business, Years With Yellow Pages, Amenities, Phone, Stress Address, Locality, Price Range.

🎯 Targeted Users: business owners, data analysts, and competitor researchers alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your business data management and make informed decisions with YellowPages Lead Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Yellow Pages ❗️🔒
